tool_description: show latest climates though guardian times etc
name: Clima Change Live
title: Clima Change Live

api_list.name: Get individual news paper news
api_list.description: get only one news paper news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clima-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clima-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clima-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clima-change-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all climate change news
api_list.description: This endpoint  will return back all news about climate change from all over the world
api_list.code:

url = "https://clima-change-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

print(response.json())
